website_summaries.verdict: This is an acceptable budget pick for a back room, but if you're looking to go all-in on smart, color-changing light in your home, keep shopping.
pros: At just $25, Feit's Siri-friendly smart bulb is brighter than competitors that cost more
You don't need a hub to pair it with Apple's Home app on your iPhone or iPad
cons: The bulb doesn't work with Alexa or Google Assistant, which leaves Siri as your only option for voice controls

You'll also need to use Apple's lackluster Home app to setup and control the bulbs, and you won't be able to control them from beyond Bluetooth range without an Apple TV, an Apple HomePod or a dedicated, always-on iPad
The bulb doesn't put out a good-looking version of orange, either

customer_reviews.title: Would not pair with HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Would not pair with HomeKit. For the record, I have 30 or so accessories paired so I’m familiar with the process. I’ve had plenty of accessories pair, then vanish and not RE-link to HomeKit but this just didn’t work out of the box. Bought 2 of these and neither one would pair.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Better than Phillips Hue (so far)
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these and love them. These replaced two Hue white bulbs due to the superior Color Rendering Index (CRI) of these bulbs (>90). While Phillips is a major player in HomeKit bulbs (I have a dozen or so), they still have inferior CRI (>80). While both bulb brands are supposed to be 2700K for a soft white light, the Feit bulb is a bit warmer. I much prefer this look. I can’t speak to the longevity of the bulbs yet. Setup was super easy and took <5 minutes total for two bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: R Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easiest HomeKit Light Bulb
customer_reviews.text: If you're a HomeKit only person, and you want to rely entirely on an Apple TV or HomePod as your only Apple Home "base" device, this is the easiest option. These don't require a bridge, and don't even require a Feit app. Just plug them in, use the iOS Home app to scan the HomeKit code and you're done in less than 2 minutes. Can't speak to reliability, as I just set them up. Will update review later if I have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dimming my lamp
customer_reviews.text: I use Siri to control and dim my lamp from my phone or iPad. Bluetooth control works from well over 50 feet away. When using iPhone when away from home to remotely control the bulb, the iPad must be left at home and left on and plugged into charger with auto lock disabled in display & brightness in setting to work as a hub. The bulb will also save its last dim setting when turning it on from the switch on the lamp itself. Does not lose Bluetooth connection after a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: ezday

customer_reviews.title: Good after firmware update
customer_reviews.text: Great smart lightbulb. Some issues connecting to HomeKit. Needed to update the firmware first. Instructions to upgrade firmware as of Nov 2019: - Turn on the bulb. Light should turn on. It might flash a few times. -Download “FEIT OTA” from the App Store. - In the app select “More” then “Equipment upgrade GATT” - Tap the bulb icon in the app. Should be called Something like “FEIT A19” - Click upgrade firmware - Should take 5 minutes or so. Leave the phone on. Down let the phone turn off automatically. - all done
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Can’t connect to Apple HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: As light bulbs they are fine but the pint of are they are HomeKit certified I spent about 2 useless hours trying to sync them but could not. I have a home filled with Smart bulbs that are synced to my SmartThing hub and have been using that since it was a kickstarter years ago. I would recommend NOT to buy these if you an to use them as a HomeKit enable bulb
customer_reviews.author: clb

customer_reviews.title: Easiest HomeKit Light Bulb
customer_reviews.text: If you're a HomeKit only person, and you want to rely entirely on an Apple TV or HomePod as your only Apple Home "base" device, this is the easiest option. These don't require a bridge, and don't even require a Feit app. Just plug them in, use the iOS Home app to scan the HomeKit code and you're done in less than 2 minutes. Can't speak to reliability, as I just set them up. Will update review later if I have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny V

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for Tech Person
customer_reviews.text: This smart light is convenient if you are a tech person. It is easy to connect to your iPhone because it supports Apple HomeKit/ amazon Alexa and you can control the lightness on your phone. Installation may take some time because when I first scanning the QR code on the bulb, it didn’t work. After restarted as the guide, it was all set.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Zent

customer_reviews.title: Not very smart lights.
customer_reviews.text: Lights won’t work at all with Alexa and work poorly with apples home app. I have five of the Feit lights set up through home. However, anytime the phone goes to sleep, the app loses connection with the lights until the phone is completely shut off and restarted. So much for smart lighting. Our Philips lights work without fail connecting through Alexa or home apps.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Loy

customer_reviews.title: Colors are off a bit...but it was cheap
customer_reviews.text: Colors seem a bit off but I finally figured out how to get the color I want, it is just a different color than what my phone shows.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Great product, avoid warehouse deals scam!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price! Avoid the Amazon Warehouse deal! Someone is returning these with dumb bulbs and non-HomeKit bulbs. Amazon is not checking these packages when refurbing.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Shiraz

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay connected to WiFi. Constantly shows No Response in Home app.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Works great with HomeKit!
customer_reviews.text: Easily connected to my HomeKit network and add to my automation timers. I also used the separate “FEIT OTA” app from the App Store to update the firmware on the bulb. That process also worked as expected. So far I have no complaints with this bulb and would recommend it to anyone looking for a HomeKit capable bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Tried several times and was never able to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.text: Tried several times and was never able to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.author: WillGo

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get these to connect to HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: I was optimistic about this product, as it promised an easy hub-free connection to Apple HomeKit. What I was met with was an exercise in frustration. I could not get HomeKit to recognize these and had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Smith

customer_reviews.title: You MUST update bulbs firmware for iOS 13...
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far, but I tried to pair it 6 times and it kept failing...I boxed it up and was all set to return it when I thought I would go to their website and read the troubleshooting FAQ. Sure enough, their were special instructions for iOS 13. I updated it OTA and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: John Vlaun

customer_reviews.title: Not for outside use, even porch does not work
customer_reviews.text: Turned back in. They are spotlights but the company told me they don’t work outside
customer_reviews.author: AlaineeRose

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the bulb to reset and go into pairing mode. Waste of time
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Never works. I make sure the light is always on and getting power and control it with the app but most of the time it says it’s not responding.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked Perfectly and is still working! It was easy to install and get hooked up to Apple Homekit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works great with Siri and apple products.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Did not pair up.
customer_reviews.text: Does not pair to my HomeKit app. It keeps saying can’t find accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Ant V

customer_reviews.title: I can't reset my bulb
customer_reviews.text: I follow the step to reset. But it can't work. The orther is normal use.The WIFI is broken?
customer_reviews.author: VivaLin

customer_reviews.title: Extended evaluation:  Doesn’t stay connected.
customer_reviews.text: When it works it works well. Unfortunately, it doesn’t stay connected. I’m having to constantly reconnect the bulb to the home network. I’m using Comcast’s hardware, which is pretty good and has excellent range. All my smart switches work fine. Once the bulb is connected, it works well with Siri. I’m able to tell Siri to turn it on/off, up/down, and even change the color. Red, blue, white, green... not sure if it disconnects over time, or if it’s because the main power to the lamp is turned off. For whatever reason, I’m having to reset the light back to default and reconnect to my network. That of course, defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great for only a short while, no support from Feit
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs connect easily via the Apple Home app. However, one WiFi interruption and they are dead! Will not reconnect, will not reset, will not even work like normal lightbulbs. It feels good smashing them with a hammer, though. Always wear safety goggles. Feit online support is just not there - even the chatbot doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with Apple
customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to Apple home. Junk. Will cause you ptsd.
customer_reviews.author: Mathine's

customer_reviews.title: HomeKit support is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it takes more than 10 seconds to respond. Sometimes it doesn't work at all. Absolutely terrible support for HomeKit. Look for alternatives
customer_reviews.author: csilver

product_meta.title: Feit Electric OM60/RGBW/HK 60W Equivalent Tunable Changing A19 Smart, Works with Apple HomeKit and Siri Voice Control, No Hub Required LED Light Bulb, 4.4" H x 2.4" D, Multi-Color RGBW
product_meta.description: Color:Multi-color Rgbw| Style:A19 HomeKitThis Feit Electric tunable White, color changing, A19 smart LED light bulb works with apple home kit (apple’s framework for home automation). the concept of a smart home easily obtainable and customizing your light is effortless. Easily turn lights on/off, dim, set Groups and schedules with your smart phone or control lighting by asking Siri. Tailor the light to suit your mood, the tunable White feature lets you adjust light color temperature from relaxing 2700K soft White to energizing 6500K daylight. or you can increase the fun and celebrate by choosing light colors it’s up to you. Set up is simple with no special smart home hub required. The bulb connects directly to your device using Bluetooth and the apple home app that comes preloaded on your apple smart device. For away from home access, home hub set up is required. Set up your apple TV, iPad, or home pod as a home hub to enjoy scheduling and automating your lights from anywhere. Designed to fit standard light sockets, the versatile E26 medium base light bulbs makes it an easy and cost-effective way to introduce smart lighting in your ceiling fixtures, table, floor lamps and more. This reliable A19 shaped bulb is rohs Compliant, 100% mercury free and will shine for a decade or more without needing to be replaced. Now you can enjoy all the advantages of energy saving LED with the added convenience of smart home technology. Feit is a leader in first to market lighting innovations and driven to deliver the latest breakthrough in interior and exterior illumination. To us, lighting is everything. The right light can turn a house into a Home, make an unsafe area feel more secure, and navigating your way back to bed a lot easier. Our LED product portfolio includes a full line of energy efficient LED bulbs and retrofit kits. Feit Electric also manufactures energy-efficient LED luminaire including ultra-slim edge-lit ceiling fixtures, light-weight utility shop lights, and weatherproof outdoor LED fixtures. Family owned. Family operated. Based in Los Angeles, California since 1978. See more of our Feit family of products and use your gift card. Feit Home Kit Light Bulb Firmware upgrade instruction: Download FEIT OTA (Over The Air) app from app store. Have the bulbs powered on so the firmware can be detected. While bulb is on Open the FEIT OTA app. Select MORE located on the bottom right hand corner of the screen. Select EQUIPMENT UPGRADE GATT. Allow any permission in regards to allowing Bluetooth access to the app, this will be key to allow the update process to finalize. Select the light desired, this is a single add only. Once selected, the bulb will display the current FIRMWARE version. If Firmware update is applicable, please select UPDATE RIGHT NOW. Please keep in mind do not leave the app or allow the screen to timeout in sleep mode, as this will cancel the update. Once update has been successfully downloaded, we may now return to APPLE HOME APP, to add the bulb with the new compatible firmware.
feature_bullets: Easy to connect & use - upgrade to smart light bulbs that work with Apple home kit on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch (devices sold separately). connects using Bluetooth to control bulbs with your Apple smart devices or ask Siri to dim your lights, turn on or off, change Color and more. There’s no need for special smart home hubs

Features - bulbs work with Apple home kit for home automation and voice commands (compatible with iOS 10. 0. 1 or later). using a home pod, iPad, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can take control of your Lighting experience from anywhere using your iPhone or iPad to create schedules and automations that fit into your daily Routine. The bulb replaces a 60W equivalent incandescent and produces 800 lumens using only 10. 5W. This A19 classic shaped bulb with an E26 base is long lasting

Color changing - this LED light bulb offers Tunable White which adjusts light Color temperature from 2700K through 6500K or choose a colors. Choose a bright daylight or calm soft White light or from over a million colors, it’s all up to you

Smart LED technology – Feit Electric LED lights, providing the most energy efficient and highest quality light with smart Apple connectivity, are perfect for your modern, connected home. LED Lighting uses less power, rated to provide up to 15, 000 hours of reliable light, and can be controlled via your iOS device when you're away from home (home hub set up required)

Innovator in energy efficient Lighting - founded and headquartered in California, Feit Electric is celebrating 40 years as a leading global Lighting Manufacturer. From outdoor string lights to night lights, Feit Electric offers its customers a full portfolio of reliable Lighting products including home décor Lighting collections, light Fixtures, smart and feature rich high-performance Lighting solutions as well as a full line of general household, specialty light bulbs in all shapes, sizes and configurations

specifications.Material: Powdered Metal Steel, Glass, Plastic, Metal, Rubber
specifications.Special Features: Set schedules, groups and automations, remotely turn on/off, dimming, Siri voice control

specifications.Warranty Description: Warranty: this bulb has a one year warranty. Contact feit electric at info@feit. Com or call toll free 1-866-326-bulb for customer service.
